verses.verse: The words<WH1697> of Nehemiah<WH5166> the son<WH1121> of Hachaliah.<WH2446> And it came to pass<WH1961> in the month<WH2320> Chisleu,<WH3691> in the twentieth<WH6242> year,<WH8141> as I<WH589> was<WH1961> in Shushan<WH7800> the palace,<WH1002>

That Hanani,<WH2607> one<WH259> of my brethren,<WH4480> <WH251> came,<WH935> he<WH1931> and certain men<WH376> of Judah;<WH4480> <WH3063> and I asked<WH7592> them concerning<WH5921> the Jews<WH3064> that had escaped,<WH6413> which<WH834> were left<WH7604> of<WH4480> the captivity,<WH7628> and concerning<WH5921> Jerusalem.<WH3389>

And they said<WH559> unto me, The remnant<WH7604> that<WH834> are left<WH7604> of<WH4480> the captivity<WH7628> there<WH8033> in the province<WH4082> are in great<WH1419> affliction<WH7451> and reproach:<WH2781> the wall<WH2346> of Jerusalem<WH3389> also is broken down,<WH6555> and the gates<WH8179> thereof are burned<WH3341> with fire.<WH784>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> when I heard<WH8085> <WH853> these<WH428> words,<WH1697> that I sat down<WH3427> and wept,<WH1058> and mourned<WH56> certain days,<WH3117> and fasted,<WH1961> <WH6684> and prayed<WH6419> before<WH6440> the God<WH430> of heaven,<WH8064>

And said,<WH559> I beseech<WH577> thee, O LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of heaven,<WH8064> the great<WH1419> and terrible<WH3372> God,<WH410> that keepeth<WH8104> covenant<WH1285> and mercy<WH2617> for them that love<WH157> him and observe<WH8104> his commandments: <WH4687>

Let thine ear<WH241> now<WH4994> be<WH1961> attentive,<WH7183> and thine eyes<WH5869> open,<WH6605> that thou mayest hear<WH8085> <WH413> the prayer<WH8605> of thy servant,<WH5650> which<WH834> I<WH595> pray<WH6419> before<WH6440> thee now,<WH3117> day<WH3119> and night,<WH3915> for<WH5921> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> thy servants,<WH5650> and confess<WH3034> <WH5921> the sins<WH2403> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> which<WH834> we have sinned<WH2398> against thee: both I<WH589> and my father's<WH1> house<WH1004> have sinned.<WH2398>

We have dealt very corruptly<WH2254> <WH2254> against thee, and have not<WH3808> kept<WH8104> <WH853> the commandments,<WH4687> nor the statutes,<WH2706> nor the judgments,<WH4941> which<WH834> thou commandedst<WH6680> <WH853> thy servant<WH5650> Moses.<WH4872>

Remember, <WH2142> I beseech<WH4994> thee,<WH853> the word<WH1697> that<WH834> thou commandedst<WH6680> <WH853> thy servant<WH5650> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559> If ye<WH859> transgress,<WH4603> I<WH589> will scatter you abroad<WH6327> <WH853> among the nations: <WH5971>

But if ye turn<WH7725> unto<WH413> me, and keep<WH8104> my commandments,<WH4687> and do<WH6213> them; though<WH518> there were<WH1961> of you cast out<WH5080> unto the uttermost part<WH7097> of the heaven,<WH8064> yet will I gather<WH6908> them from thence,<WH4480> <WH8033> and will bring<WH935> them unto<WH413> the place<WH4725> that<WH834> I have chosen<WH977> to set<WH7931> <WH853> my name<WH8034> there.<WH8033>
Now these<WH1992> are thy servants<WH5650> and thy people,<WH5971> whom<WH834> thou hast redeemed<WH6299> by thy great<WH1419> power,<WH3581> and by thy strong<WH2389> hand.<WH3027>

O Lord,<WH136> I beseech<WH577> thee, let now<WH4994> thine ear<WH241> be<WH1961> attentive<WH7183> to<WH413> the prayer<WH8605> of thy servant,<WH5650> and to<WH413> the prayer<WH8605> of thy servants,<WH5650> who desire<WH2655> to fear<WH3372> <WH853> thy name:<WH8034> and prosper,<WH6743> I pray<WH4994> thee, thy servant<WH5650> this day,<WH3117> and grant<WH5414> him mercy<WH7356> in the sight<WH6440> of this<WH2088> man.<WH376> For I<WH589> was<WH1961> the king's<WH4428> cupbearer.<WH4945>
